step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen to feel the movement.
You're starting to place your hands on your abdomen. Try to feel your belly rise as you inhale.
Nicely done inhaling through your nose. Remember to gently tighten your whole body muscles as you breathe in.
Excellent exhale through your mouth. Focus on relaxing your muscles completely as you breathe out.
Great start to your second repetition. Ensure you're maintaining a comfortable posture.
You're placing your hands on your abdomen well. Try to feel the breath filling your belly.
Good job inhaling through your nose. Remember to engage your entire body muscles gently during the inhale.
Well done exhaling through your mouth. Focus on fully relaxing your body as you release the breath.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose while gently tightening your whole body, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. This helps stimulate lymphatic flow and promotes healing.
